I'm a **Software Engineer, Frontend Engineer, Technical Writer, and Community Engineer.**  

Right now, I'm a **PhD student in Computer Science & Engineering at the University of Cincinnati (Aug 2025 ‚Äì Present)**, where my work leans into **data-driven research, intelligent systems, and cloud-scale applications**.  

I work as a **Research Assistant**, exploring how **data, statistical reasoning, and lightweight AI systems** can improve decision-making, automation, and real-world usability. Alongside research, I still build polished user interfaces (React/Svelte/Tailwind) and enjoy making complex systems feel simple through good design.

Before Cincinnati, I built a strong foundation in frontend engineering, technical writing, and community work across multiple learning and internship experiences.
